cf item 105

question.title: Question
question.description: What is the indication for an electroencephalogram (EEG) in adults experiencing malaise or loss of consciousness suspected to be of epileptic origin?

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: A history of trauma or stroke

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: A history of epilepsy or seizures
